title: SET_VEHICLE_DOOR_OPEN
content:
0x7C65DAC73C35C8620xBB75D38B// SetVehicleDoorOpen
void SET_VEHICLE_DOOR_OPEN(Vehicle vehicle, int doorIndex, BOOL loose, BOOL openInstantly);Parameters:vehicle: Vehicle.doorIndex: Index of the door you want to open (0-7)loose: Whether the door is "loose" (if true the doors have no "spring" and can be closed easily.)openInstantly: Whether the doors open instantly (if true this native seems to ignore loose)Sets the specified door index open on the passed vehicle. See IS_VEHICLE_DOOR_FULLY_OPEN.Examples:Lualocal Vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsUsing(PlayerPedId())
for i = 0, 5 do
  SetVehicleDoorOpen(Vehicle, i, false, true) -- will open every door from 0-5
end
codeBlocks:
// SetVehicleDoorOpen
void SET_VEHICLE_DOOR_OPEN(Vehicle vehicle, int doorIndex, BOOL loose, BOOL openInstantly);

local Vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsUsing(PlayerPedId())
for i = 0, 5 do
  SetVehicleDoorOpen(Vehicle, i, false, true) -- will open every door from 0-5
end
